statements: SELECT id, product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount, sale_date, id FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_date, id, product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount, id FROM SalesData;
SELECT sale_amount, product_name, id, sale_date FROM SalesData;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount < 500 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM SalesData ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_name FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%';
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount, sale_date FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY sale_amount ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM SalesData
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleDate DESC;
SELECT ProductName, SalesAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SalesAmount > 1000;
SELECT SalesID, ProductName FROM SalesData WHERE SaleDate BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT CustomerName, Email FROM CustomerData ORDER BY CustomerName ASC;
SELECT * FROM PromotionData WHERE Discount >= 0.1 ORDER BY EndDate ASC;
SELECT SalesID, ProductName, SalesAmount FROM SalesData WHERE SalesAmount > 1000;
SELECT CustomerName, Email, Phone FROM CustomerData WHERE CustomerName LIKE 'A%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalSales, SUM(SalesAmount) AS TotalSalesAmount FROM SalesData;
SELECT PromotionName, Discount, StartDate, EndDate FROM PromotionData WHERE StartDate < '2023-01-01';
SELECT CustomerName, Email, Phone, ProductName, SalesAmount FROM CustomerData JOIN SalesData ON CustomerData.CustomerID = SalesData.SalesID;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT store_name, location FROM Stores ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price > 500;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM Promotions WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30' AND end_date >= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 AND sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT store_name, location, COUNT(*) AS total_sales FROM Stores JOIN SalesData ON Stores.store_id = SalesData.store_id GROUP BY store_name, location HAVING total_sales > 100 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT promotion_name, discount, start_date, end_date FROM Promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData;
SELECT ProductID, Price, Quantity FROM SalesData WHERE SaleDate BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT CustomerID, FirstName, LastName FROM Customers ORDER BY LastName ASC;
SELECT PromoName, Discount FROM Promotions WHERE StartDate <= '2022-01-01' AND EndDate >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT SaleID, ProductID, Price, Quantity, SaleDate FROM SalesData ORDER BY SaleDate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE SaleID = 100;
SELECT ProductID, SaleDate FROM SalesData WHERE Quantity > 5 ORDER BY SaleDate DESC;
SELECT CustomerID, TotalAmount FROM SalesAnalysis WHERE PromoID = 1 AND TotalAmount > 1000;
SELECT FirstName, LastName, Email FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT ProductName, Category, Price FROM Products WHERE Price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY Category ASC, ProductName DESC;
